thread.title: U.N. Security Council approves 30-day humanitarian truce in Syria

title: U.N. Security Council approves 30-day humanitarian truce in Syria
text:
U.N. Security Council approves 30-day humanitarian truce in Syria 2:37am IST - 01:26 
The United Nations Security Council approved a resolution demanding a 30-day truce to allow aid deliveries and medical evacuations with the support of Syrian ally Russia after a flurry of last-minute negotiations. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The United Nations Security Council approved a resolution demanding a 30-day truce to allow aid deliveries and medical evacuations with the support of Syrian ally Russia after a flurry of last-minute negotiations.
